description:
Running Unintu 18.4.

Downloaded the software.

Tried to 'Launch'. Nothing happened!

Went to the Application Menu. Could find no reference to WDune - or even Dune.

Tried to get it running from Terminal. Terminal. No success. Removed application.

basically blender for kids its great
everyone below me is an idiot who should be running stupid windows

Today this popped up as a recommendation so I looked at it again.

Seeing that Leonard Goodlad has now left a 5 star glowing review, and that I had just completed a fresh install of Ubuntu 18.04, I was hopeful of success this time.

However, despite installing with no error reports, when it came to 'Launch' there was one flicker of the screen - and then nothing!

I looked into the Applications Menu but there was no sign of this programme.

I tried to 'Launch' again from the installation window but this time there was not even a flicker.

I shut down and rebooted, wondering if this was necessary to finalise the installation. 

Again, no sign of WDune in the Application Menu and it still failed to Launch from the Installation window.

I opened the 'Snap' directory and found a folder for 'WDune'. However the three sub-folders were all empty, - even with "Show Hidden Files" being ticked.

WDune obviously installs and works correctly - on an appropriately configured operating system, as evidenced here by Leonard Goodlad. 

However, it does not install/work on my Ubuntu 18.04 which has only just been set up and only has a handful of other applications installed.

I would be very interested to know if others can get this working, and if so, what operating system and version they are using.

Thanks for reading this far.

Thisisi
summary: Fresh Ubuntu 18.04. Still will not install and run!

description:
Installed on Ubuntu 20.10 using vanilla gnome-session in Wayland. Won't launch, does flicker briefly which makes me suspect it might be a Wayland issue. Hopefully not malware!

Like another poster mentioned - there didn't seem to be any application icon in the shell either.
When I tried to launch it, it wont, it just opened for 1 sec

la verdad s que nisiquiera mla pue usar por que despues e instalara no me aparecio en ningun lugar
por eso solo le doy una estrella por que si pudiera darle 0 le daria eso , por favor arreglen eso.
summary: no se que pasa pero arreglenlo
la aplicacion no me deja entrar
